pages.title: Ancient Ruins
pages.text: Deep underground you found this huge structure, which entrance seems to be protected by a strong, magical force.

pages.title: The Entrance
pages.text: What might be hiding from you behind this barrier? What do these glyphs mean?

pages.title: Being Worthy
pages.text: It looks like wearing Azure Dike equipment allowed you to enter.$(br2)Until now, you thought you were alone in your creative endeavour with the gems and pigments. From the looks of it, you were wrong. $(italic)So very, very wrong...

pages.title: A Challenge?
pages.text: Whoever built these structures, they obviously followed the same path as you, but they were miles ahead of you, technologically.$(br2)Still, anyway. You accept the challenge, of course. You have one huge advantage:$(br)$(italic)YOU are still alive.
